Package org.neo4j.common

Class HexPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.common.HexPrinter
  • public class HexPrinter
extends Object
    Prints streams of bytes as hex, printed in columns and rows neatly ordered. For example:

    • Constructor Detail

      • HexPrinter

        public HexPrinter​(PrintStream out)
        Using no line number, 8 bytes per group, 32 bytes per line, 4-space separator as default formatting to print bytes as hex. Output looks like:

        01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08
        01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08

        Parameters:
        out -

      • HexPrinter

        public HexPrinter​(PrintStream out,
                  int bytesPerGroup,
                  String groupSep)

      • append

        public HexPrinter append​(ByteBuffer bytes)
        Append the bytes in the byte buffer, from its current position to its limit into print stream. This operation will not move the buffers current position.
        Parameters:
        bytes -
        Returns:

      • hex

        public static String hex​(ByteBuffer bytes,
                         int offset,
                         int length)
        Convert a subsection of a byte buffer to a human readable string of nicely formatted hex numbers. Output looks like: 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08
        Parameters:
        bytes -
        offset -
        length -
        Returns:
        formatted hex numbers in string

      • hex

        public static String hex​(ByteBuffer bytes,
                         int offset,
                         int length,
                         int bytesPerBlock,
                         String groupSep)

      • hex

        public static String hex​(ByteBuffer bytes)
        Convert a full byte buffer to a human readable string of nicely formatted hex numbers using default hex format. Output looks like: 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08
        Parameters:
        bytes -
        Returns:
        formatted hex numbers in string

      • hex

        public static String hex​(ByteBuffer bytes,
                         int bytesPerBlock,
                         String groupSep)

      • hex

        public static String hex​(byte[] bytes)
        Convert a full byte buffer to a human readable string of nicely formatted hex numbers. Output looks like: 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08 01 02 03 04 05 06 07 08
        Parameters:
        bytes -
        Returns:
        formatted hex numbers in string

      • hex

        public static String hex​(byte[] bytes,
                         int bytesPerBlock,
                         String groupSep)

      • hex

        public static String hex​(byte b)
        Convert a single byte to a human-readable hex number. The number will always be two characters wide.
        Parameters:
        b -
        Returns:
        formatted hex numbers in string
